name: Cupcakes Matching Game Lite
description:
Train your Memory and have fun with cupcakes!

Tap to flip card, find those with the same cupcake to make them disappear. But Hurry up, because time is ticking.
3 Levels:
- Easy: find matching pairs in a 4x3 board
- Medium: find matching pairs in a 4x4 board
- Hard: find matching pairs in a 5x4 board.
** CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS IN GAME CENTER **
Have fun!!

*** LITE VERSION HAS ONLY EASY LEVEL ***
BUY FULL VERSION TO GET TWO MORE LEVELS AND ALL THE FUN

*** APP ICON AND MAIN CUPCAKE BY LAZY CRAZY - http://www.artdesigner.lv
